code: import api from"./client";export const authApi={login:(username,password)=>api.post("/api/auth/token/",{username,password}),logout:()=>{localStorage.removeItem("access_token");localStorage.removeItem("refresh_token");},getUser:()=>api.get("/api/auth/user/")};export const stockApi={analyzeStock:symbol=>api.post("/api/stocks/",{symbol}),getStockAnalysis:symbol=>api.get("/api/stocks/".concat(symbol,"/")),getStocks:()=>api.get("/api/stocks/")};export const recommendationApi={generateRecommendation:data=>api.post("/api/recommendations/generate/",data),getRecommendations:()=>api.get("/api/recommendations/"),getActiveSignals:()=>api.get("/api/recommendations/active/"),executeRecommendation:id=>api.post("/api/recommendations/".concat(id,"/execute/"))};export const portfolioApi={getPortfolios:()=>api.get("/api/portfolio/"),createPortfolio:data=>api.post("/api/portfolio/",data),getPortfolio:id=>api.get("/api/portfolio/".concat(id,"/")),getPortfolioSummary:id=>api.get("/api/portfolio/".concat(id,"/summary/")),addCapital:(id,amount)=>api.post("/api/portfolio/".concat(id,"/add_capital/"),{amount})};export const riskApi={assessRisk:data=>api.post("/api/risk/assess/",data),getRiskAssessments:()=>api.get("/api/risk/")};export const signalApi={generateSignals:data=>api.post("/api/signals/",data),getSignals:()=>api.get("/api/signals/")};export const intradayApi={generateIntradaySignal:data=>api.post("/api/intraday-signals/",data),getIntradaySignals:()=>api.get("/api/intraday-signals/")};export const paperTradingApi={startPaperTrade:data=>api.post("/api/paper-trading/",data),getPaperTrades:()=>api.get("/api/paper-trading/"),closePaperTrade:id=>api.post("/api/paper-trading/".concat(id,"/close/"))};export const alertApi={createAlert:data=>api.post("/api/smart-alerts/",data),getAlerts:()=>api.get("/api/smart-alerts/"),deleteAlert:id=>api.delete("/api/smart-alerts/".concat(id,"/"))};export const marketApi={getMarketSummary:()=>api.get("/api/market-summary/"),getSupportResistance:symbol=>api.post("/api/support-resistance/",{symbol})};export const investmentApi={getInvestmentPlan:data=>api.post("/api/investment-planner/",data),getAlternatives:data=>api.post("/api/ai-explain/",data)};
